segments.text: Hello Mrs Parker , how have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello Dr Peters . Just fine thank you . Ricky and I are here for his vaccines .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well . Let's see , according to his vaccination record , Ricky has received his Polio , Tetanus and Hepatitis B shots . He is 14 months old , so he is due for Hepatitis A , Chickenpox and Measles shots .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I can only give him these for now , and after a couple of weeks I can administer the rest .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , great . Doctor , I think I also may need a Tetanus booster . Last time I got it was maybe fifteen years ago !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will check our records and I'll have the nurse administer and the booster as well . Now , please hold Ricky's arm tight , this may sting a little .
segments.speaker: S1
